SynQ: SYNtactic Quantification of grammar complexity.

16 August 2004

Copyright 2004 James F. Power, NUI Maynooth, Ireland <jpower@cs.nuim.ie>

This version last edited on 16 August 2004, with minor corrections on 09 July 2005.

Directory Structure

  • src: The source code
  • html_doc: Documentation, as generated by Doxygen
  • grammars/standards: Grammars for various languages
  • grammars/parsers: Grammars from C++ parsers, mostly gcc

For more information

See: "A metrics suite for grammar-based software", by James F. Power and Brian A. Malloy, Software Maintenance and Evolution: Research and Practice, Vol. 16, No. 6, November/December, 2004.
